name: advancia-pay-ledger
description: Enterprise Fintech SaaS Platform - Transaction Management & AI Automation

scripts.dev:local: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev:backend:local" "npm run dev:frontend:local"
scripts.dev:backend:local: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend:local: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run dev
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run prod:backend" "npm run prod:frontend"
scripts.prod:backend: cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.prod:frontend: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:deploy: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy

author: Advancia Pay
